oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Words and sentences with many entries concerning the names of celestial bodies and the heavens. p.199v features a note on the great star, which follows daybreak (the Day's Heart star, or Jupiter). p.200v contains further notes on stars and their names and movements as well as what the |xam call them (such as the 'husband', and the 'mother' and 'child').
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences (including the names of stars)
